item.title: Guest post in Alt1040: Fabricantes de dispositivos Android: dejen de joder la interfaz de usuario (carta abierta)
item.description: As you could imagine, I am honored and happy. It feels like when you get your thoughts published in the letters to the editor section of traditional newspaper: really good. Iâ€™m looking forward to the coments by the readers
